description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file Author: Michael Haag, FPT.EagleEye. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
name: Bitsadmin Download
query: ((process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND ((process.command_line:(*\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:*http*) OR process.command_line:*\ \/transfer\ *)) OR process.command_line:*copy\ bitsadmin.exe*)
